suggested_query: They inscribed meaning onto the material, making the ornate the only language capable of conveying the essence of the time. These intricate patterns told a story of excess and indulgence, a fleeting world of opulence and decay.
suggest_context: To misread this layer as merely decorative is to strip it of speech. Although the aforementioned subjects of ornament are easily dismissed as kitsch from a contemporary view, the objects made their surface legible, not dissimilar to pictograms:
